text:
If the <jar> task of ant 1.5.1 performs an update and no manifest attribute is 
specified, it replaces an existing MANIFEST.MF with the ant supplied default 
manifest. This break's ant 1.4 buildfiles.
creator: georg.ragaller@nse.de
bodewig@apache.org
text:
Duplicate of Bug 12651 ?

Could you modify Ant as suggested in this report and see whether it fixes your
problem?

The modifications described in Bug 12651 solve the problem.

(The modification is missing the 'import java.util.jar.JarFile')
creator: georg.ragaller@nse.de

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 12651 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
